body_html: I think the relevant part of the message is 'Error: /job:worker/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0 unknown device.' Could you include mnist_yetanother.py as well to make sure you are setting up the cluster spec correctly?
body_text: I think the relevant part of the message is 'Error: /job:worker/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0 unknown device.' Could you include mnist_yetanother.py as well to make sure you are setting up the cluster spec correctly?
body: I think the relevant part of the message is 'Error: /job:worker/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0 unknown device.' Could you include mnist_yetanother.py as well to make sure you are setting up the [cluster spec](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/how_tos/distributed/index.md) correctly?
